pages.text: Pneumaticcraft: Represurized, is a mod about air pressure and using it in contraptions, to make your life eaiser.$(br2)It's very fun to play around with, but needs a little bit of preparation to get into.$(br2) First gather some iron and TNT.
Compress iron, by dropping it and then explode some TNT!$(br2)This will destroy some iron!
Now that you have compressed iron, you can craft your pneumatic $(item)guide book$().$(br2)Refer to it for more information about pneumatic contraptions.
